name: U413.COM - Biohazard
description:
● Changes the font to Terminus, a much better font then Courier New.
  Download it from here; http://misc.nybergh.net/pub/fonts/terminus/ttf/Terminus.ttf
● Makes the input line standout more.
● Adds a background.

Update;
● Prevents applying the background to the new chat box. Looks better.
